direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods validate that an object is not null but with different error messages.
Both methods validate that an object is not null with customizable error messages.
Both methods handle null checks with similar control flows and exception handling.
Both methods handle null checks and throw exceptions with customizable messages.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require a validation context to be set up before execution.
Environment setup is required before performing null parameter validation.
Both methods handle and verify validation exceptions in similar ways.
